statements: UPDATE diversity_inclusion_metrics SET gender='Male', tenure_years=3 WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE diversity_inclusion_metrics SET race_ethnicity='Hispanic', department='HR', tenure_years=5 WHERE employee_id=202;
UPDATE diversity_inclusion_metrics SET gender='Female', race_ethnicity='Hispanic', department='HR' WHERE employee_id=12345;
UPDATE diversity_inclusion_metrics SET tenure_years=5, department='Marketing' WHERE employee_id=54321;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET age = 30 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE inclusion_metrics SET inclusion_training_completed = TRUE, team_satisfaction_score = 85 WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET age = 30, department = 'HR', gender = 'Female', ethnicity = 'Hispanic' WHERE employee_id = 1;

UPDATE inclusion_metrics SET team_satisfaction_score = 95, inclusion_training_completed = TRUE, diversity_hiring_goal_met = FALSE, employee_feedback = 'Positive feedback received from employee regarding work environment' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET department='Marketing' WHERE employee_name='Alice';
UPDATE inclusion_feedback SET feedback_text='Good work, keep it up!' WHERE employee_name='Bob';
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET department='Human Resources', hire_date='2022-01-01' WHERE id=1001;
UPDATE inclusion_feedback SET feedback_text='The team meeting was very inclusive and productive.', feedback_date='2022-02-15' WHERE id=2002;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET gender='Male', age=30 WHERE employee_id=12345;
UPDATE diversity_initiatives SET description='New description of the initiative', end_date='2023-12-31' WHERE initiative_id=9876;
UPDATE diversity_metrics SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE inclusion_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great initiative, keep it up!' WHERE employee_id = 105
UPDATE DiversityAndInclusionMetrics SET department = 'HR', ethnicity = 'Asian', age = 35 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE EmployeeFeedback SET date_submitted = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 205
UPDATE DiversityAndInclusionMetrics SET gender = 'Female', age = 35 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CompanyInitiatives SET description = 'New initiatives for promoting diversity and inclusion in the workplace', start_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE id = 3;
